statements: SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE loan_id = 100;
SELECT loan_id, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount >= 500;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE loan_id IN (200, 201, 202);
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE loan_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 AND loan_id = 5 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment, MIN(payment_amount) AS min_payment FROM Payments;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT PaymentID, Amount FROM Payments WHERE LoanID = 1001;
SELECT PaymentDate, Amount FROM Payments WHERE LoanID = 2002 ORDER BY PaymentDate DESC;
SELECT CustomerID, LoanAmount FROM Loans WHERE InterestRate > 4.5;
SELECT DISTINCT LoanID FROM Payments;
SELECT PaymentID, LoanID, Amount, PaymentDate FROM Payments WHERE PaymentDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE Amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY Amount DESC;
SELECT Payments.PaymentID, Loans.CustomerID, Payments.Amount, Loans.LoanAmount FROM Payments JOIN Loans ON Payments.LoanID = Loans.LoanID WHERE Payments.Amount > Loans.LoanAmount;
SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Amount) AS TotalPayments FROM Payments JOIN Loans ON Payments.LoanID = Loans.LoanID GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING TotalPayments > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE PaymentID IN (SELECT PaymentID FROM Payments GROUP BY PaymentID HAVING COUNT(PaymentID) > 1);
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM Loans WHERE interest_rate < 5.0 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payments JOIN Loans ON Payments.loan_id = Loans.loan_id WHERE Loans.interest_rate > 0.1;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE start_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM Payments);
SELECT * FROM Payments
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM Loans WHERE loan_amount < 5000 ORDER BY loan_id DESC
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM Payments JOIN Loans ON Payments.loan_id = Loans.loan_id
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31' ORDER BY payment_date;
SELECT Loans.loan_id, Loans.loan_amount, Payments.amount FROM Loans INNER JOIN Payments ON Loans.loan_id = Payments.loan_id WHERE Loans.loan_amount > Payments.amount;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE loan_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, loan_id FROM Payments;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_type FROM Loan;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount, payment_id, transaction_id FROM TransactionHistory;
SELECT payment_date, amount_due, loan_id, schedule_id FROM PaymentSchedule;
SELECT borrower_id, borrower_name, address FROM Borrower;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_id = 100;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM Loan WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, address FROM Borrower WHERE borrower_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT payment_id, amount_due FROM PaymentSchedule WHERE loan_id = 200;
